title: Vue.js Developer
description: We are looking for a Vue.js developer to join our team. Responsibilities include building user interfaces, implementing components, and ensuring a smooth user experience.

title: Nuxt.js Engineer
description: Build amazing applications using Nuxt.js! We're seeking a talented engineer to develop and maintain our Nuxt.js applications.

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our backend team to build robust API services and database solutions for our enterprise clients.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design beautiful and functional interfaces for web and mobile applications. Work closely with development teams to implement your designs.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma or Adobe XD

title: Angular Full Stack
description: Develop modern web applications using JavaScript technologies across the stack. From frontend to backend, you'll be involved in all aspects of the development process.
requirements: Experience with React, Vue, or Angular

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using React and modern frontend tools.
requirements: Proficiency with hooks and context API
State management with Redux or similar
